name: Pong 99
description:
Pay homage to the original Atari PONG game. Play offline against a computer or with a friend in local multiplayer. The game also offers a Battle Royal mode. Can you beat 99 other players? Try it!

Controls:

Move Up: "W" or top arrow key ↑

Move Down: "S" or down arrow key ↓ 

Pause Menu: "ESC"

Show Scoreboard: "TAB"

Specs:

Gerne: Retro game, Sport

Engine: Unity

Platform: PC

Controls: Keyboard & Mouse

Pong 99 is a solo project. I built it because I wanted to learn how to make an online multiplayer game. The game is still work in procress.

William K.
